tool_description: Get all countrys in the world
title: COUNTRYS-API

api_list.name: Get Country By Code
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://countrys-api.p.rapidapi.com/country/get-code/{code}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "countrys-api.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All Country
api_list.description: Potensial error but large data json
api_list.code:

headers = {

api_list.name: Get Countrys Pagination
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://countrys-api.p.rapidapi.com/countrys/{page}/{perpage}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "countrys-api.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Country By ID
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://countrys-api.p.rapidapi.com/country/{id}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "countrys-api.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
